# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your needs perfectly. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what most people are willing to pay. However, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $180, considering our long-standing relationship and understanding of your requirements. This opportunity won't last, so I encourage you to make a decision soon. Thank you for considering our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
